title: Driver, conductor sentenced to death for causing deaths of 41 passengers
content: A file photo of Yangalmodara accident The driver and conductor of a private bus, which was driven through a closed level crossing, at Yangalmodera in Alawwa and was hit by a moving train, causing the death of 41 passengers and injuring 35 others, were yesterday sentence to death by Puttalam High Court Judge Priyantha Fernando….
